decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Condition : 2 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (546-100, 546-101, 546-102, 546-103, 546-104, Unnumbered Location Plan, Design & Access Statement, Flood Risk Assessment (24/01/2011), Construction Document Register, Construction Method Statement (04/12/2015). Received: 01/12/2015. 546-105REV.B, 546-106REV.A, 546-107REV.A, 546-108REV.A, 546-109REV.B, 546-110REV.A, Received: 25/01/2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 4 - No demolition or construction work shall take place on the site except between the hours of 8:00am  to 6:00pm on Mondays to Friday and 9 :00am to 1:00pm on Saturdays and none shall take place on Sundays and Public Holidays without the prior agreement of the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 5 - The basement shall not be converted into a separate dwelling or for the use as residential accommodation.
description: Erection of a single storey side and rear extensions and formation of basement
